name: Happy little accidents: lessons from 3 games and 2 MUD versions
description: We'll chat about the history of MUD, all the things that went wrong in previous iterations of the engine, games we built with it, and the lessons we learned from it.

speakers.name: Alvarius
speakers.bio: Co-founder and CTO of Lattice. Working on MUD, among other things. Previously built OPCraft.
